bioconda.name: bioconductor-mbkmeans
bioconda.summary: Mini-batch K-means Clustering for Single-Cell RNA-seq

biotools.summary:
Fast clustering for single cell data using mini-batch k-means.

Mini-batch K-means Clustering for Single-Cell RNA-seq.

Implements the mini-batch k-means algorithm for large datasets, including support for on-disk data representation.

Clustering, GeneExpression, RNASeq, Sequencing, SingleCell, Software, Transcriptomics.
